snippet: Adam Irving’s documentary is the story of Darius McCollum, a man with Asperger’s syndrome who borrows trains and buses for joy rides....
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Adam Irving documentary film Off the Rails, about New York City Man Darius McCollum, who has Asperger’s syndrome and is obsessed with transit systems.
lead_paragraph: Adam Irving’s documentary is the story of Darius McCollum, a man with Asperger’s syndrome who borrows trains and buses for joy rides.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Off the Rails,’ an Eager Conductor Stalks New York’s Transit System
headline.print_headline: A New York Joy Rider  With a One-Track Mind
